= !TimeToLive property =

*Project:* [ConsoleAppClasses  Console Application Runner Classes].

*Unit:* _PJConsoleApp_.

*Class:* _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_.

*Introduced:* v1.0

{{{
property TimeToLive: LongWord;
}}}

== Description ==

This read only property indicates the amount of time, in milliseconds, the console application has left to run before timing out. The value will be `INFINITE` if _[TPJConsoleAppMaxExecTime MaxExecTime]_ is `INFINITE`.

_!TimeToLive_ is only of any use if accessed within an _[TPJConsoleAppOnWork OnWork]_ event handler. The property will always be 0 once a process completes.
